basics.name: Marten Schlüter
basics.label: Full Stack Software & Energy Systems Engineer
basics.summary: A global citizen with roots in Germany, a founder in Estonia, and a life between Panama and the US, I bring a diverse perspective to my work. I am a Full Stack Software Engineer with a degree in Energy Systems Engineering, specializing in developing and maintaining custom client solutions. My expertise lies in backend development and DevOps, complemented by experience in frontend development and machine learning. Driven by curiosity and a passion for efficiency, I thrive on creating software solutions that make a meaningful impact.

education.institution: Technische Hochschule Mittelhessen - University of Applied Sciences

certificates.name: Tackling the Challenges of Big Data

publications.name: Simulation of a solar air heater with built-in thermal storage
publications.publisher: XV Congreso Latinoamericano de Control Automático

work.summary: summar.ee makes voice message communication easy and convenient. It transcribes, translates, and summarizes voice messages using OpenAI's Whisper/ChatGPT and the DeepL API. The service is available on Telegram
work.name: summar.ee
highlights: OpenAI Whisper/ChatGPT for voice message transcription, translation and summarization
Telegram integration using python-telegram-bot and telethon for large file transfer using MTProto
DeepL API integration for translation
PostgreSQL and SQLAlchemy as the database backend
CI/CD workflow using Github Actions

work.summary: urlwiz.io is a search engine for domains for sale. It uses vector search to find the best results in over 1000000 listings based on a project description
work.name: URL Wizard
highlights: OpenAI ChatGPT for computing embeddings for domains and project descriptions
Next.js frontend with TailwindCSS
PostgreSQL with pgvector and SQLAlchemy as the database backend for fast vector search
FastAPI backend
Stripe payment integration
Highly memory efficient ETL pipeline for updating the domain database
CI/CD workflow using Github Actions

work.summary: abilit.ee is a software engineering agency based in Estonia that provides services to clients worldwide. We are a team of experienced professionals who are passionate about technology and innovation.
work.name: abilit.ee
highlights: Rapid Prototype Development & market validation of digital products & services
Infrastructure monitoring & maintenance
Consulting & support for clients in the implementation of digital solutions
Data Analysis & Machine Learning
Deep domain knowledge in Energy Systems Engineering
(Homepage built with astro.js, React and tailwindcss; CI/CD workflow using Github Actions; Deployed on Cloudflare Pages)

work.summary: Odoo is an open-source software company offering a modular suite of business applications, including ERP, CRM, e-commerce, and accounting. Its flexible, user-friendly platform serves businesses of all sizes, with both a free community edition and a feature-rich enterprise edition available.
work.name: Odoo - Professional Services
highlights: Development & maintenance of custom-tailored client solutions
Design, evaluation, and implementation of code & database migrations with a focus on high availability and performance
Consultation and support of clients in the implementation of Odoo modules
Backend: Python, PostgreSQL, Docker, Github, odoo.sh
Frontend: Javascript, HTML, CSS, XML, QWeb

work.summary: Imagine2030 is a platform for people who want to develop solutions for the climate crisis - with a focus on sustainable mobility and renewable energies.
work.name: Imagine 2030 mobility accelerator
highlights: development and evaluation of innovative business ideas
agile methods, design thinking, lean startup
entrepreneurship, evaluation of business models & ideas
user-centric development based on export and customer interviews
presentation and communication

work.summary: R+S is a consulting company based in Munich that provides engineering services in technical infrastructure. The client base includes the public and private sectors
work.name: Rücker + Schindele Beratende Ingenieure
highlights: conceptualizing, design, planning and implementation of an automation and predictive maintenance strategy in a wastewater treatment plant  (project volume 1,8 Mio. €)
conceptualizing, design, planning and implementation of the retrofit of an emergency power system 2 x 2.500 kVA in Berlin (project volume 3,2 Mio. €)
implementation of retrofit of energy & control systems in the Engelbergbasistunnel, Stuttgart (project volume 3.8 Mio. €)

work.summary: energicos is an innovative provider of sustainable energy solutions. The company is based in Berlin and has a strong focus on data-driven energy efficiency and renewable energies.
work.name: energicos
highlights: Development of ETL pipelines for energy data
Design and implementation of Outlier Detection algorithms for predictive maintenance application
Implementation of Linear Regression models for optimal equipment sizing based on long-term operational data
Python, seaborn, statsmodels, pandas, numpy, scikit-learn, PostgreSQL, d3.js

work.summary: Borsig is a Berlin-based producer of industrial heat exchangers and pressure vessels. The company's history reaches back 185 years. It serves clients worldwide.
work.name: Borsig Process Heat Exchanger GmbH
highlights: calculation of heat exchangers according to international codes
Implementation of a design & calculation engineering software for heat-exchangers based on different international codes in C#
